code: import _objectSpread from"/Users/robertorossa/Desktop/Cursos/coderHouse/react-coderhouse-project/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2.js";import{collection,doc,getDoc,getDocs,getFirestore,query,where}from"firebase/firestore";export var getAllProducts=function getAllProducts(){var database=getFirestore();var collectionReference=collection(database,'items');return getDocs(collectionReference).then(function(snapshot){var list=snapshot.docs.map(function(doc){return _objectSpread({id:doc.id},doc.data());});return list;}).catch(function(error){return console.warn(error);});};export var getProduct=function getProduct(id){var database=getFirestore();var itemReference=doc(database,'items',id);return getDoc(itemReference).then(function(snapshot){if(snapshot.exists()){var item=_objectSpread({id:snapshot.id},snapshot.data());return item;}});};export var getProductsByCategory=function getProductsByCategory(categoryId){var database=getFirestore();var collectionReference=collection(database,'items');var collectionQuery=query(collectionReference,where('category','==',categoryId));return getDocs(collectionQuery).then(function(snapshot){if(snapshot.size===0)return[];var list=snapshot.docs.map(function(doc){return _objectSpread({id:doc.id},doc.data());});return list;}).catch(function(error){return console.warn(error);});};
